title: The digital doctor's visit: Enormous potential benefits with equally big risk

title_detail.value: The digital doctor's visit: Enormous potential benefits with equally big risk

summary: One out of at least 10 patients records doctors' visits, usually on a cell phone; Apple recently released a new Health Records feature built into the Health app as part of iOS 11.3. No longer a wave of the future researchers have analyzed the benefits of digital recordings of healthcare visits, the need to create a new model of health data ownership, and potential cybersecurity threats.
